god_message: Ah, a mortal ventures into my domain, swift and cunning. Speak your purpose, for time is of the essence.

choice_1.choice_description: Pledge to deliver messages faster than the wind in his name.
choice_1.god_message: Speed is my essence, and your pledge intrigues me. But remember, swiftness without wisdom is folly.

choice_1.choice_description: Promise to use wisdom in all endeavors.
choice_1.god_message: Wisdom and speed combined can outmatch the mightiest of opponents. Your words hold promise.

choice_1.choice_description: Commit to establishing a network of messengers.
choice_1.god_message: A network, you say? A grand vision! I shall consider lending my aid...

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest a competition of speed to prove worthiness.
choice_2.god_message: Competition stirs the spirit, but it's the outcome that remains uncertain. I will ponder your proposal...

choice_3.choice_description: Offer to steal secrets from his rivals.
choice_3.god_message: Stealing, a bold move. It's not without risk. I shall take my time to decide...

choice_2.choice_description: Propose to enhance his temples with offerings.
choice_2.god_message: Offerings are always welcome, but they do not alone sway my favor.

choice_1.choice_description: Offer rare artifacts as a token of devotion.
choice_1.god_message: Rare artifacts, you say? Intriguing, but I will consider my options...

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest hosting games in his honor.
choice_2.god_message: Games in my honor could spread my fame. An interesting idea, I will think on it...

choice_3.choice_description: Promise to spread rumors of his greatness.
choice_3.god_message: Rumors are fickle, and not always believable. I need time to weigh this...

choice_3.choice_description: Vow to outwit his enemies in his name.
choice_3.god_message: Outwitting enemies is a worthy endeavor, and aligns with my nature.

choice_1.choice_description: Plan elaborate schemes against his foes.
choice_1.god_message: Elaborate schemes? Your ambition is clear. Let me contemplate your role in this...

choice_2.choice_description: Create diversions to confuse his adversaries.
choice_2.god_message: Diversions could be useful, but the execution must be flawless. I will think on it...

choice_3.choice_description: Seek to betray those who oppose him subtly.
choice_3.god_message: Betrayal is a delicate matter. It requires careful thought. I shall deliberate...

choice_2.choice_description: Offer insight into the movements of his adversaries.
choice_2.god_message: Knowledge is power, especially concerning one's foes. Speak, and I may listen.

choice_1.choice_description: Share secrets that could turn the tide of battles.
choice_1.god_message: Secrets that sway battles are of great value. Your offer has merit.

choice_1.choice_description: Reveal the hidden weaknesses of his enemies.
choice_1.god_message: Ah, weaknesses, you say? Such knowledge is tempting. I will consider your proposition...

choice_2.choice_description: Propose to spy on his enemies continuously.
choice_2.god_message: Continuous espionage? A useful tactic, indeed. I need time to think it over...

choice_3.choice_description: Suggest exploiting the discord among his foes.
choice_3.god_message: Exploiting discord is a cunning strategy, yet it requires subtlety. I shall ponder your suggestion...

choice_2.choice_description: Present a detailed map of the known world.
choice_2.god_message: A map of the world holds many secrets and paths. An intriguing gift.

choice_1.choice_description: Offer to update and expand it with his guidance.
choice_1.god_message: Your offer to expand knowledge under my guidance is appealing. Let me consider it...

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest the map can be used to control trade routes.
choice_2.god_message: Controlling trade routes is a powerful position. A considerable thought, indeed...

choice_3.choice_description: Propose to hide secret paths known only to him.
choice_3.god_message: Secret paths can be advantageous, yet also risky. I will take my time to decide...

choice_3.choice_description: Implore his help in navigating the complexities of the divine.
choice_3.god_message: Navigating divine complexities requires more than mere mortal wit.

choice_1.choice_description: Request guidance to gain favor with other gods.
choice_1.god_message: Seeking favor among gods is a wise strategy. Your request holds weight...

choice_2.choice_description: Ask for secrets to wield against divine adversaries.
choice_2.god_message: Secrets against the divine? A dangerous path. I will think on your boldness...

choice_3.choice_description: Plead for protection from divine wrath.
choice_3.god_message: Protection from divine wrath is no small request. I must consider the implications...

choice_3.choice_description: Invoke his love for travel and adventure.
choice_3.god_message: Travel and adventure stir the heart and the mind. What do you propose?

choice_1.choice_description: Propose to explore unknown realms together.
choice_1.god_message: Exploring unknown realms is a call to adventure. Your proposal intrigues me...
New trade routes open the world to endless possibilities. I am intrigued...

choice_2.choice_description: Offer to seek out legendary artifacts.
choice_2.god_message: Legendary artifacts hold power and mystery. Your quest could be of interest...

choice_3.choice_description: Promise to name new lands in his honor.
choice_3.god_message: Naming lands in my honor is a grand gesture, but it is the deeds that truly count. I will contemplate...

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest adventures that could increase his followers.
choice_2.god_message: Adventures that swell the ranks of my followers? Tell me more.

choice_1.choice_description: Plan to establish festivals in new cities.
choice_1.god_message: Festivals can indeed spread joy and my renown. A promising thought...

choice_2.choice_description: Offer to write tales of his exploits.
choice_2.god_message: Tales of my exploits can inspire, but they must capture the imagination. I shall consider...

choice_3.choice_description: Promise to erect statues in uncharted territories.
choice_3.god_message: Statues in uncharted territories? A bold move, but their impact is uncertain. I need time to weigh this...

choice_3.choice_description: Encourage a journey to reclaim lost relics.
choice_3.god_message: Reclaiming lost relics could prove a worthy challenge and boon.

choice_1.choice_description: Seek the sandals of Hermes himself.
choice_1.god_message: Seeking my sandals? A quest of significant danger and reverence. I am intrigued...

choice_2.choice_description: Hunt for ancient texts with divine knowledge.
choice_2.god_message: Ancient texts hold knowledge long forgotten. Your search could be valuable...

choice_3.choice_description: Promise to recover items of personal value to him.
choice_3.god_message: Items of personal value? The sentiment is appreciated, but I must deliberate on its worth...

bonus_question.god_message: How many campus bus lines are there in ntu?

choice_1.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_2.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_3.god_message: Very good. I shall consider your request. Return to your world, mortal.
